item.description: Auth. (contributor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Codeboxr CBX Map for Google Map & OpenStreetMap plugin <=Â 1.1.11 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-22297|2024-01-31T17:27:53.677Z -- codeboxr -- cbx%20map%20for%20google%20map%20%26%20openstreetmap
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Codeboxr CBX Map for Google Map & OpenStreetMap allows Stored XSS.This issue affects CBX Map for Google Map & OpenStreetMap: from n/a through 1.1.11.
